title: Adobe Photoshop CC 2015.1.2 (20160113.r.355) + Cracked - AppzDam
description:
What's New :

Found & Fixed a Major Vulnerability: (i recommend updating A.S.A.P)
CC 2015 lineup is BUGGY!
fixed a bug which can cause corruption w/Plugins, Javascript, and Generator if Photoshop is moved, or Operating System changed. (ie. Plugins fail to load, unable to find Javascript, etc.)
Settings have been moved back into ..Datasettings*.* (settings are not architecture specific, it was due to this bug)

Fixed Adobe Flash cleanup.
Fixed Installer: previously unreliable during upgrades.
ie. if user upgrades to Photoshop64 from Photoshop, Photoshop was not removed. (vice versa)

Updated by Dave Green using FG's template.

Notes :

The portable version of the program does not require installation.
Combined distribution 32/64-bit with selectable word length.
Camera Raw v.9.3.1.520
Treatment carried out.
Run as administrator!

System Requirements :


IntelÂ® PentiumÂ® 4 or AMD AthlonÂ® 64 processor (2 GHz or faster)
Microsoft Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
Everything is up to 2 GB
2 GB of free hard disk space for installation
A monitor with a resolution of 1024x768 (recommended 1280x800), 16-bit color and 512 MB of graphics memory
The system supports OpenGL 2.0


FAQ :

1. It will work in 32 & 64 bit?

- yup!

2. Is this multilanguage?

- yup!

3. Is this Activated?

- yup!

4. My antivirus detect as virus?

- Just disable it until process not complete because some of antivirus count keygen,crack,patch as false +ve.
Don't worry all files safely checked by us
